why: Seven faculty members do research on machine learning methods and applications: vision, image analysis, robotics, natural language processing.
Graduate courses for introduction and advanced topics such as deep learning

Faculty-directed labs have state-of-the-art software and hardware, including GPU and database servers. Compute Canada provides high-performance cluster computing. The Cedar node, housed at SFU, has 150 GPUs.
